venue.name: The Middle East Restaurant and Nightclub

item.description:
By definition this is Toubab Krewe: An American instrumental band which fuses the music of Mali with American musical styles (particularly those of the Southern United States).

Ok, now for my definition:
Two years ago I was at a festival and had just seen Galactic. I thought my dancing tank was depleted. Then I stumbled into the Toubab Krewe stage area and I was rejuvenated. By the end I was a swirling exhausted dancing mess- it was an amazing show and I would love to turn some new folks onto the joy that is Toubab Krewe's music.

So come join me at the Middle East for a new music experience! Let's do pre show drinks- maybe loosen some of you up so perhaps some dancing magic can happen! Once we get closer to the date of the show we can discuss a preshow place of choice. Seriously, check the music out! Is it a little different from some of the regular shows posted? Yes, but new music is almost always a good thing!

Take care,
Jenn
http://www.toubabkrew...
Tickets= $15
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide my cell phone number prior to the meetup
item.name: Toubab Krewe
